name: LUMBERJACK (kinces, BulbaME)
description:
This game was created for Ludum Dare 50 using Rust and plain OpenGL.

Once apon a time lumberjack father and lumberjack son were leaving in the woods. They were protecting their forest from ghosts and were keeping alive plants. But suddenly father was taken by death. Lumberjack son was very sad, because his father was the dearest person to him. The year before lumberjack father and lumberjack son planted a tree in their backyard. Now this tree was only reminder to lumberjack son about his father. Help lumberjack to save his father's tree... or at least make your best


GitHub: https://github.com/bulbaME/ldjam50
